,

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hemipilia calophylla C.S.P.Parish & Rchb.
f., J. Bot. 12: 197, 1874. Type :â€” MYANMAR . Mon State : Mawlamyine District ,
Aug 1873
,
Parish 348
( lectotype K, designated by Clayton 2017: 60 ; isolectotypes: K, W-R 18829 + icon.).

Heterotypic synonyms:

f., Bot. Mag. 123: t. 7521, 1897. Type :â€” MYANMAR . Shan State : imp. & cult.
Lewis s.n.
( holotype : K )
